about_the_game:
TVhead is a stealth adventure set in the once beautiful technological city of N. After the crisis, the city lost its colors and plunged into the realities of a dystopia with new cruel ideals: equality, obedience, order.

The main character will have to go from the lower levels of the slums to the roofs of the central districts, cope with unexpected threats, get to know the structure and laws of this place better, without turning into a pile of garbage and details.

- Find yourself in the place of a TV on mechanical paws, with its limited capabilities (You are a TV, you cannot open a door, drag a heavy object or interact with complex mechanisms)

- Compensate for the shortcomings of television by capturing people's consciousness (capturing the body by jumping on the head or sending signals from a distance)

- In order not to catch the eye of law enforcement officers, use various techniques.(hiding, sneaking up, distracting, causing “accidents” or finding a safe path.)
